nodes.title: Understand the Role of a Data Analyst
nodes.desc: Learn what a data analyst does, including key responsibilities and required skills.

nodes.title: Learn the Basics of Statistics
nodes.desc: Understand fundamental statistical concepts and methods.

nodes.title: Descriptive Statistics
nodes.desc: Learn measures of central tendency (mean, median, mode) and measures of variability (range, variance, standard deviation).

nodes.title: Inferential Statistics
nodes.desc: Understand hypothesis testing, confidence intervals, and p-values.

nodes.title: Develop Excel Skills
nodes.desc: Learn to use Excel for data manipulation, analysis, and visualization.

nodes.title: Formulas and Functions
nodes.desc: Master basic and advanced Excel functions such as VLOOKUP, INDEX-MATCH, and pivot tables.

nodes.title: Data Visualization in Excel
nodes.desc: Learn to create charts, graphs, and dashboards.

nodes.title: Learn SQL for Data Analysis
nodes.desc: Understand how to query databases and manipulate data using SQL.

nodes.title: Basic SQL Queries
nodes.desc: Learn to SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE data.

nodes.title: Advanced SQL Techniques
nodes.desc: Master joins, subqueries, window functions, and CTEs (Common Table Expressions).

nodes.title: Learn a Programming Language for Data Analysis
nodes.desc: Get proficient in a programming language commonly used in data analysis, such as Python or R.

nodes.title: Python for Data Analysis
nodes.desc: Learn to use libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.

nodes.title: R for Data Analysis
nodes.desc: Learn to use libraries like dplyr, ggplot2, and tidyr.

nodes.title: Master Data Visualization Tools
nodes.desc: Learn to use specialized tools for creating advanced visualizations.

nodes.title: Tableau
nodes.desc: Get skilled at creating interactive and shareable dashboards.

nodes.title: Power BI
nodes.desc: Learn to build visualizations and business intelligence reports.

nodes.title: Gain Experience with Real Data
nodes.desc: Work on real-world projects to apply your skills.

nodes.title: Personal Projects
nodes.desc: Develop your own projects to solve problems or answer questions of interest.

nodes.title: Internships and Freelance Work
nodes.desc: Gain practical experience through internships or freelance opportunities.

nodes.title: Build a Portfolio
nodes.desc: Showcase your skills and projects in an online portfolio.

nodes.title: Document Your Work
nodes.desc: Provide detailed explanations of your projects and methodologies.

nodes.title: Use Online Platforms
nodes.desc: Create a profile on platforms like GitHub, LinkedIn, or a personal website.

nodes.title: Continue Learning and Stay Updated
nodes.desc: Keep your skills up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in data analysis.

nodes.title: Online Courses and Certifications
nodes.desc: Enroll in courses and earn certifications from reputable organizations.

nodes.title: Industry News and Research
nodes.desc: Follow industry news, research papers, and blogs to stay informed.
